medical_history.chief_complaint: Observation following ERCP due to acute pancreatitis and RUQ pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient has had chronic right lower quadrant pain related to PSC. Over the past few months, she has experienced increasing abdominal pain when she has not passed stool for one or two days, likely related to worsening IBS. After ERCP, she developed severe onset epigastric pain around 1am. Lipase was elevated to 1000.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Crohn's disease, Primary sclerosing cholangitis, Irritable bowel syndrome, Asthma, Vocal cord dysfunction, GERD, Cholecystectomy.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of CRC or IBD.
